params.currency: address of the currency to add

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.currency: address of the currency to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.cursor: cursor (should start at 0 for first request)

addCurrency(address).notice: Add a currency in the system

isCurrencyWhitelisted(address).notice: Returns if a currency is in the system

removeCurrency(address).notice: Remove a currency from the system

viewWhitelistedCurrencies(uint256,uint25.notice: See whitelisted currencies in the system

userdoc.notice: It allows adding/removing currencies for trading on the Joepeg exchange.
